content.question: An object is subject to multiple forces that result in the object having horizontal and vertical velocity components <math alttext="v sub x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mi>x</mi></msub></math> and <math alttext="v sub y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mi>y</mi></msub></math>, respectively as a function of time, as shown. Which of the following diagrams could represent the forces exerted on the object?

choices.label: The figure shows a force diagram which consists of two arrows extending from a dot on a coordinate grid. A pair of axes indicate that positive x points horizontally to the right, and positive y points vertically upward. The first arrow extends vertically upward three units. The second arrow extends vertically downward three units.

The figure shows a force diagram which consists of two arrows extending from a dot on a coordinate grid. A pair of axes indicate that positive x points horizontally to the right, and positive y points vertically upward. The first arrow slants to the left two units and upward three units. The second arrow extends vertically downward three units.

The figure shows a force diagram which consists of three arrows extending from a dot on a coordinate grid. A pair of axes indicate that positive x points horizontally to the right, and positive y points vertically upward. The first arrow slants to the left two units and upward three units. The second arrow extends vertically downward three units. The third arrow extends horizontally to the left two units.

The figure shows a force diagram which consists of three arrows extending from a dot on a coordinate grid. A pair of axes indicate that positive x points horizontally to the right, and positive y points vertically upward. The first arrow extends vertically upward three units. The second arrow extends horizontally to the right two units. The third arrow slants to the left two units and downward four units.

content.answer: The figure shows a force diagram which consists of three arrows extending from a dot on a coordinate grid. A pair of axes indicate that positive x points horizontally to the right, and positive y points vertically upward. The first arrow extends vertically upward three units. The second arrow extends horizontally to the right two units. The third arrow slants to the left two units and downward four units.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
